thread.title: BRIEF-Weyerhaeuser reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.35

title: BRIEF-Weyerhaeuser reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.35
text:
April 27, 2018 / 7:16 AM / Updated 2 hours ago BRIEF-Weyerhaeuser reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.35 Reuters Staff
April 27 (Reuters) - Weyerhaeuser Co: * Q1 SALES $1.9 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $1.83 BILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.33 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.36 EXCLUDING ITEMS
* EXPECTS Q2 EARNINGS AND ADJUSTED EBITDA WILL BE SIGNIFICANTLY HIGHER THAN Q2 OF 2017, BUT LOWER THAN Q1 OF 2018 FOR TIMBERLANDS
* EXPECTS SIGNIFICANTLY HIGHER EARNINGS BEFORE SPECIAL ITEMS AND ADJUSTED EBITDA IN Q2 COMPARED WITH Q1 FOR WOOD PRODUCTS
* SAYS CONTINUE TO EXPECT FY 18 ADJUSTED EBITDA FOR REAL ESTATE, ENERGY & NATURAL RESOURCES SEGMENT WILL BE APPROXIMATELY $250 MILLION.
* SAYS ANTICIPATES Q2 EARNINGS AND ADJUSTED EBITDA WILL BE COMPARABLE TO Q1 FOR REAL ESTATE ENERGY & NATURAL RESOURCES SEGMENT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
